PelisUP!

Plataforma para ver peliculas y series üòÅ

{{ movie.name }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MovieSerie } from 'src/app/shared/interfaces/MovieSerie.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inicio', templateUrl: './inicio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inicio.component.css'] }) export class InicioComponent { movies_series : MovieSerie[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Die Hart the Movie', description: 'Follows a fictionalized version of Kevin Hart, as he tries to become an action movie star. He attends a school run by Ron Wilcox, where he attempts to learn the ropes on how to become one of the industrys most coveted action stars.', image: ".\assets\shang-chi.svg", rating: 0, category: 'Movie' }, { id: 2, name: 'Prueba 2', description: 'Prueba description 2', image: '.\assets\black-widow.svg', rating: 0, category: 'Serie' }, { id: 3, name: 'Prueba 3', description: 'Prueba description 3', image: '.\assets\loki.svg', rating: 0, category: 'Movie' } ] }
